attributes.action: Fire services act 2004 abolition and judicial review in fire service cuts
attributes.additional_details: The fire services act 2004 was a crass piece of legislation designed solely to close fire stations reduce fire cover and cut firefighters wages to poverty levels . The purpose of this petition is to ensure a judicial review into the fire services act 2004 and to bring back clear guaranteed and understandable minimum levels of fire cover across the uk
